title: More on Christ and the World Religions
itunes:title: More on Christ and the World Religions
description: Last week, I spoke of the many "family resemblances" between Christianity and the other great religious traditions. This week, I look at the other side, all the points of disagreement. How do we balance all of this? Both the Epiphany and the Baptism of the Lord provide clues.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
